title: The Pool Party 'Party' Party Parties on!
body:
Yesterday, the Pool Party 'Party' Party room [hit 101 people](http://imgur.com/o7uXYYU)! That's pretty awesome! Our next giveaway will happen when we beat that milestone!

**When;** Now, until Sunday
**What;** Premade 5s games, and mystery gifts
**Where;** the LoL client chatrooms.

'_Pool Party_' chatroom, for finding games teams and friends.
'_P5_' chatroom for events, such as giveaways.

For more information, check out the original [Pool Party 'Party' Party](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/lejmvbzJ-the-pool-party-party-party) thread.

Presumably, Pool Party 'Party' Party Players Pursue to Produce Prodigious Points. They need you!

replies.body: what you are doing is awesome
